ygData.subject: Re: Wizards are fun - Stop the protest
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a lv 18 wiz that has had very good success soloing and grouping. I have no complants about how a spell works or how much damage it does or how unfair
ygData.messageBody:
I am a lv 18 wiz that has had very good success soloing and grouping. I have
no complants about how a spell works or how much damage it does or how
unfair something is. I enjoy the game and have found that most every
character type has it's own flaws. A particular spell may not work as you
like it to but remember that if we got everything we wanted we would only
want more and bigger.
As for those of you who KS it is your choise and you'll regret it latter.
I've met many KS's and while at lower lv's it is good and everything latter
on when you need a little help or want to group your life will be miserable.
I know so because I've made KS's lives miserable by refusing to work with
them and the shouting so that all know what he is like. While there is a few
that will group with them on the whole I've seen very few people who do
group with him. Usually he is alone and miserable. That my bit and so so
